definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: When I arrived in Yarmouth , I went straight to Barkis's house.
sentences.chinese: 到達雅茅斯後，我徑直來到了巴克斯家。

sentences.english: Paula Baxter says people still come to the library to borrow books and movies. But now they can also download e-books.
sentences.chinese: 保巴克斯特說，人們還是來圖書館借閱書籍和電影。

sentences.english: Without Ceres and Bacchus, Venus grows cold.
sentences.chinese: 離開克瑞斯和巴克斯，維納斯便心灰意冷。

sentences.english: Both are known for their devotion to mentoring, Backus says.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯說，兩人都以熱心輔導學生而著稱。

sentences.english: Moreover, in the church at the top of the painting of the god Bacchus.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在教堂的頂部，畫上了酒神巴克斯。

sentences.english: Barkis lay silently there, not moving.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯靜靜地躺着，一動不動。

sentences.english: The driver is so angry that he throw Baxter into the river.
sentences.chinese: 那個駕駛員非常生氣，他把巴克斯特扔進河裏去了。

sentences.english: As Ham went out , I went upstairs to see poor Barkis.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆走後，我上樓去看可憐的巴克斯。

sentences.english: The child would grow up to be Bacchus, the great god of wine.
sentences.chinese: 這個嬰兒就是大名鼎鼎的酒神巴克斯。

sentences.english: “Golden mountain” against the background of Garden of Bacchus.
sentences.chinese: “金色山”的背景是酒神巴克斯花園。

sentences.english: The Barkers now have one more reason to love alpacas.
sentences.chinese: 現在的巴克斯有一個更有理由愛羊駝。

sentences.english: Now you'll have to return those sweets to Mr Baxter.
sentences.chinese: 現在你也應該把偷來的糖果還給老巴克斯特先生。

sentences.english: Barkis is a good man and I'm sure I'll be happy with him.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯是個好人，我相信跟他一起生活會很快樂。

sentences.english: How many hayfields are there in a small rural town like Buxton?
sentences.chinese: 像巴克斯登這樣的鄉下地方，會有多少牧草地？

sentences.english: When we arrived in Yarmouth and got down from the cart, we said goodbye to Mr Barkis.
sentences.chinese: 我們到達雅茅斯，下了馬車，與巴克斯先生道別。

sentences.english: But I am betting he disappeared in the direction of Buxton.
sentences.chinese: 但我敢說他一定是消失在往巴克斯登的方向。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
